suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on enhancing the proportions and detailed textures of the figures and animals. Study real-life references to understand the anatomy and structure of children, birds, and dragons. Incorporate more detailed shading and lighting to create depth and perspective. Pay attention to the consistency of light sources and shadows to make the scene more cohesive. Additionally, use more natural and muted colors to reflect real-life tones, and practice drawing more intricate details to add to the lifelike quality of the artwork.
